hero.headline: Simple, Innovative & Smart Clean Energy
hero.sub: Leading manufacturer of Solar Water Heater parts and LED Street Lights in Maharashtra since 2014.

contacts.puneOffice: Walhekar Wadi Road,Near Munjoba Mandir,Chinchwad, Pune, Maharashtra 411033

mission: To save power with simple, innovative smart ways so everyone is empowered to create a zero energy footprint for themselves, their home and their business.
about:
OOJED Solutions designs, manufactures and installs dependable clean-energy systems across Maharashtra. We specialise in solar water heating, solar pumping systems, LED street & flood lighting, and turnkey rooftop/ground-mounted solar plants. Unlike marketplace listings, this site represents our direct manufacturing and project delivery capabilities: in-house engineering, factory testing, and a local field service team for rapid commissioning and reliable after-sales support.

We focus on real-world performance: corrosion-resistant components for hard-water regions, surge-protected LED products, and solar pump systems sized to deliver the correct flow and head for each site. For developers and municipalities we provide technical documentation, installation support, and 1:1 project planning. Contact us to request a site survey or an itemised quotation.

categories.name: Solar Water Heaters
